message: feat: replace central J with WebGL orb and fix mobile orbit responsiveness
title: feat: replace central J with WebGL orb and fix mobile orbit responsiveness
content:
FEATURE: feat: replace central J with WebGL orb and fix mobile orbit responsiveness

- Add new WebGL orb component using OGL library
- Replace basic pulsing J with interactive shader-based orb
- Fix mobile orbit radius to be static (180px) across all screen sizes
- Maintain all existing orbital timeline functionality
- Add hover effects and smooth rotation to orb

message: feat: implement interactive education display cards with 21st.dev-inspired stacking
title: feat: implement interactive education display cards with 21st.dev-inspired stacking
content:
FEATURE: feat: implement interactive education display cards with 21st.dev-inspired stacking

- Add EducationDisplayCards component with smooth stacked animations
- Integrate skills section in two-column layout (Education left, Skills right)
- Implement 1200ms smooth transitions with custom easing curves
- Fix card spacing and overlap for better content visibility
- Add proper hover states and visual hierarchy
- Prevent layout bleeding and improve responsive design
- Install 21st.dev display-cards component for reference

message: feat: V4 orbital timeline with enhanced career data & polished locked state
title: feat: V4 orbital timeline with enhanced career data & polished locked state
content:
FEATURE: feat: V4 orbital timeline with enhanced career data & polished locked state

- Added 5th career node with progressive data structure
- Enhanced Old Mutual node with internal career progression stepper
- Integrated rich achievements and metrics from resume data
- Streamlined homepage by removing redundant work experience section
- Implemented password protection for confidential projects node
- Added polished locked state with proper card height matching unlocked cards
- Cleaned up locked state copy and removed redundant content
- Added subtle security note with session timeout info
